name: usertour
description: Usertour is a self-hosted platform for creating in-app tours, onboarding flows, and product walkthroughs. It injects guided steps into your apps and provides analytics via a web dashboard.
features: Visual tour builder: Create product tours and onboarding flows with a visual drag-and-drop editor.
In-app guidance: Display step-by-step walkthroughs directly within your application.
Element targeting: Target specific UI elements to highlight and explain features.
Conditional logic: Show different tour steps based on user behavior or attributes.
Analytics: Track tour completion rates and user engagement to optimize onboarding.
Multi-step flows: Build complex onboarding sequences with multiple steps and branches.
Customizable styling: Match tour appearance to your brand with custom CSS and themes.
User segmentation: Show different tours to different user segments or roles.
Trigger options: Launch tours automatically, on user action, or via API calls.
Progress tracking: Monitor which users have completed tours and where they drop off.
A/B testing: Test different tour variations to find the most effective onboarding.
JavaScript SDK: Integrate tours into web applications with a lightweight JavaScript library.
